description: This file defines a React component 'ProductDetail' responsible for displaying detailed product information, fetching product data from an API, handling errors, and allowing users to add the product to their shopping cart.

methods.name: useEffect
methods.description: React hook used to perform side effects, specifically fetching product data when the component mounts or when the 'id' parameter changes.

methods.name: setProduct
methods.description: State updater function for updating the 'product' state after fetching data or in case of an error.

methods.name: setQty
methods.description: State updater for the quantity of product to be added to cart.

methods.name: setError
methods.description: State updater to set error messages if data fetch fails.

methods.name: addItem
methods.description: Function from useCart hook to add an item to the shopping cart.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronous function that fetches product data from the API and updates component state, or sets sample data in case of error.
